docs.text: Home ⚑ About ⚑ Kelvin Joson has more than 12 years of expertise in ICT Business Analysis and Support Engineering, as well as an additional 5 years of experience in Semiconductor Test Product Engineering. He is a licensed Electronics Engineer, a certified SAFe 5 Practicioner , and a SAFE 5 PO/PM . He is well-versed in semiconductor test engineering and automobile manufacturing execution systems.
